data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: As Commander-in-Chief of the new Colonial Virginia regiment in 1754, Colonel George Washington's headquarters were located in Winchester before and during the French and Indian War. He ____ from ____ service ____ 1758. He ____ appointed a general ____ the Continental Congress ____ years ____. Meanwhile, Washington ____ Frederick County in ____ first ____ office, having ____ elected ____ the House of ____ in 1758 and 1761. Daniel Morgan was another famous general during the American Revolutionary War, from (present day Clarke County).
data.partBlankContent: As Commander-in-Chief of the new Colonial Virginia regiment in 1754, Colonel George Washington's headquarters were located in Winchester before and during the French and Indian War. He resi____ from mili____ service i_ 1758. He w__ appointed a general b_ the Continental Congress six____ years la___. Meanwhile, Washington repre______ Frederick County in h__ first elec____ office, having be__ elected t_ the House of Burg_____ in 1758 and 1761. Daniel Morgan was another famous general during the American Revolutionary War, from (present day Clarke County).
data.answer: 1754年，乔治·华盛顿上校作为新弗吉尼亚殖民地团的总司令，在法印战争前和战争期间，他的总部都设在温彻斯特。1758年，他辞去了军职。16年后，他被大陆会议任命为将军。与此同时，华盛顿在弗雷德里克郡的第一个选举办公室代表他，在1758年和1761年被选为下议院议员。丹尼尔·摩根是美国独立战争期间另一位著名的将军，来自(今天的克拉克县)。
